text: ““Ngati titabwerera m’chipembedzo chanu pambuyo potipulumutsa Allah m’menemo, ndiye kuti tampekera Allah bodza. Sikungatheke kwa ife kubwerera m’chipembedzo chimenecho pokhapokha atafuna Allah, Mbuye wathu. Mbuye wathu Ngodziwa zonse. Ndipo kwa Allah Yekha ndiko tayadzamira. Mbuye wathu! Weruzani mwa choonadi pakati pathu ndi pakati pa anthu athu. Inu Ngabwino poweruza kuposa oweruza.”
